#summary Describes project embox's usage on HW-SPAR3AN-SK-UNI-G Starter Kit

= HOW-TO =

 # Install [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/linux-hotplug/fxload-2008_10_13.tar.gz fxload]
 # Install *Xilinx_11.1_ISE_DS_SFD.tar* by _sudo ./xsetup_
 # Choose to install *Embedded Development Kit*
 # Choose *Install Cable Drivers* (if you don't use RH or Suse, then [http://www.xilinx.com/support/answers/22648.htm readme], driver doesn't support kernel > 2.6.18)
 # Update with *Xilinx_11.3_ISE_DS_lin.tar*
 # After connection usb cable try  _/sbin/fxload -v -t fx2 -I path/Xilinx/11.1/common/bin/lin/xusb_emb.hex -D /dev/bus/usb/dev_num/id_
 # _export LD_PRELOAD=libusb-driver.so_
 # _export PATH=path/Xilinx/11.1/EDK/bin/lin:$PATH_
 # _xmd -hw system.xml_
 # attach with _mb-gdb -nw path/embox_
{{{
>target remote localhost:1234
>load
>define ss
>si
>x/2i $pc
>end
}}}

Download [http://embox.googlecode.com/files/xilinx-spartan-dev-kit.xz scripts].
